install.name: Youversity News Slider
install.author: YouJoomla.com
install.description: THANK YOU FOR INSTALLING YOUVERSITY NEWS SLIDER

param.name: module_template
param.label: Select default module template
param.description: You can create custom module templates for YouVersity News Slider Simply copy modules/mod_youversity_slider/tmpl/Default folder , rename it to your own template name and edit default.php within your template folder to your liking. Once you have created your module template , your template name will be visible here. You can also copy your template folder to your template/html/mod_youversity_slider/ folder and create custom overides for each module instance. To get you started we have created blank module template name New

param.name: slider_width
param.label: Slider width
param.description: Should not be wider than the module holding div container

param.name: get_items
param.label: News items category
param.description: In this categorie there must be min 1 news item published

param.name: item
param.label: Select specific items
param.description: Choose specific news items you would like to display. Note that category setting above will not take affect if this option is choose.

param.name: getspecific
param.label: Specific items list and order
param.description: First select few items from setting above. Drag and drop to re-order items. Click the remove icon to remove an item from the list. Note that the items reorder works only if you set News items ordering to Specific items order!

param.name: ordering
param.label: News Items Ordering
param.description: Choose news items order sequence. Note that Specific items order is the display order of your Specific items order setting above

param.name: nitems
param.label: Number of news items to display
param.description: Number of news items to display

param.name: slider_image_width
param.label: Intro image width
param.description: If left empty , image will keep its original size. Note: To avoid image distortion use only width or only height.

param.name: slider_image_height
param.label: Intro image height
param.description: If left empty , image will keep its original size. Note: To avoid image distortion use only width or only height.

param.name: show_title
param.label: Show item title?
param.description: Show or hide news item title

param.name: show_read
param.label: Show read more?
param.description: Show or hide read more text

param.name: visible_items
param.label: Visible Intro items
param.description: Set the number of visible intro items on page load

param.name: effectDuration
param.label: Effect durration
param.description: Slide transition effect duration. Defined in milliseconds.1 sec = 1000

param.name: autoslide
param.label: Autoslide
param.description: This is auto slide duration between the slides. If set to 0 slider will not slide automatically

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
